text: everybody thank you for Gathering I have
some bittersweet news to share I'm sorry
to say but our fearless later Charles
McGill will be leaving hhm effective
immediately I want to take this moment
to thank Chuck for everything he's done
for hhm we started off with six
employees and Chuck helped grow us into
one of the largest firms in the state we
will be forever grateful for his
dedication do you have anything you want
say all right then let's give him a hand
